name: xibo
description: Xibo is a self-hosted digital signage platform for designing, scheduling, and delivering content to remote displays. It provides a CMS web UI and various players to run media on screens in organizations.
features: Content scheduling: Plan and automate when specific content appears on displays with flexible calendar-based scheduling.
Layout designer: Create custom screen layouts with drag-and-drop widgets for images, videos, text, and web content.
Multi-display management: Control hundreds of remote displays from a single web interface with grouping and tagging.
Media library: Organize images, videos, and documents in a centralized library with version control and metadata.
Player support: Deploy content to Windows, Android, Linux, and web-based players with automatic synchronization.
Proof of play: Track what content played on which displays and when for compliance and reporting.
User permissions: Define granular access controls for content creators, schedulers, and administrators.
Dynamic content: Display live data feeds, weather, social media, and RSS content that updates automatically.
Campaign management: Group layouts into campaigns with priority rules and dayparting for targeted messaging.
Remote monitoring: Check player status, connectivity, and health metrics from the central dashboard.
Template library: Start quickly with pre-built templates for common signage scenarios and industries.
API integration: Connect external systems and automate content updates using comprehensive REST APIs.
